name: Sniper Assassin 3
summary: Help elite sniper Shawn Davidson get the revenge he so desperately wants in this third installment of the Sniper Assassin series. Much like the previous games, in Sniper Assassin 3, you’re embarking on a series of missions, all of which with a specific target (or targets) that you must discover and take care of. The trick is discovering how to complete each mission. Make the wrong move, and it’s over.
